segments.text: What is the best way to find a job here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are different ways of conducting a job search . Do you know what you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you work part-time or full-time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter right now , either one would be OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The binders have current local jobs listings and the computer jobs lists are good too . Understand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll go check it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Schedule an appointment with a counselor and you can get more information . Would that work for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything that you need for a successful job search is here . Happy job searching !
segments.speaker: S2
